Package com.simon.simontree.api

Interface ModificationBinaryTreeInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ModificationBinaryTree, ModificationBinaryTreeOperations
public interface ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
Defines a thread-safe binary tree that stores ModificationGroup objects with customizable sorting logic. Implementations must support multiple tree traversal methods, level-based operations, and maintain thread safety during structural modifications. Full documentation can be found in the implementation ModificationBinaryTree.

    Nested interface representing a node in the binary tree structure.

  • Method Details

    • getTreePath

      String getTreePath(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Returns the hierarchical path of a ModificationGroup in the tree structure. The path is constructed using group names separated by " / " (e.g., "Root / Europe / Hungary").
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The group to locate (non-null)
      Returns:
      The full path in the tree, or an empty string if not found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if modificationGroup is null

    • insert

      void insert(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Inserts a new modification group into the tree while maintaining the sorting order.
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The group to insert (cannot be null)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if modificationGroup is null

    • searchNodesForModificationGroup

      ModificationBinaryTree.Node searchNodesForModificationGroup(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Finds the node containing the specified modification group using BFS(Breadth-first Search). Public method, therefore nullPointerException can still occur here, despite the Objects.requireNonNull further up the chain.
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The modification group to find (non-null)
      Returns:
      The Node in which the modificationGroup is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if modificationGroup is null
      NoSuchElementException - if modificationGroup is not found or tree is empty

    • searchNodesForModifications

      ModificationBinaryTree.Node searchNodesForModifications(Modification modification)
      Finds the node containing the specified modification using BFS (Breadth-first Search). Public method, therefore nullPointerException can still occur here, despite the Objects.requireNonNull further up the chain.
      Parameters:
      modification - The modification to find
      Returns:
      The parent ModificationGroup of the modification the method searches for
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if modification is null
      NoSuchElementException - if tree is empty or modification not found

    • getLevelNumberOfModificationGroup

      int getLevelNumberOfModificationGroup(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Finds the tree level of the specified ModificationGroup. If not successful uses BFS.
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The group to locate (non-null)
      Returns:
      The level (root = 0), or -1 if not found

    • getSetOfModificationGroupsUpUntilGivenLevel

      Set<ModificationGroup> getSetOfModificationGroupsUpUntilGivenLevel(ModificationGroup modificationGroup, int upUntilThisLevel)
      Returns a Set of all ModificationGroup on this level and below it, using BFS.
      Parameters:
      upUntilThisLevel - the level up until to count the ModificationGroups
      Returns:
      Set the set of ModificationGroups up until the give level

    • getModificationsOfGivenModificationGroupAndItsChildren

      Set<Modification> getModificationsOfGivenModificationGroupAndItsChildren(ModificationGroup modificationGroup)
      Finds all modifications belonging to a group and its children.
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - The starting group (cannot be null)
      Returns:
      Set of all modifications in the subtree
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if modificationGroup is null
      NoSuchElementException - if the group is not found

    • findModificationOnGivenLevelById

      Modification findModificationOnGivenLevelById(int id, int level)
      Finds a modification by ID at a specific tree level.
      Parameters:
      id - The modification ID to search for
      level - The tree level to search (0-based)
      Returns:
      The found modification
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if no matching modification exists at the level

    • getListOfModificationGroupsOnGivenLevel

      Set<ModificationGroup> getListOfModificationGroupsOnGivenLevel(ModificationGroup modificationGroup, int onThisLevel)
      Gets all modification groups at a specific tree level.
      Parameters:
      modificationGroup - Unused parameter (maintained for backward compatibility)
      onThisLevel - The target level (0-based)
      Returns:
      Set of modification groups at the level, empty set if level doesn't exist

    • inOrder

      void inOrder()
      Performs an in-order traversal (left-root-right) and displays elements.

    • reverseOrder

      void reverseOrder()
      Performs a reverse-order traversal (right-root-left) and displays elements.

    • printTreeStructure

      void printTreeStructure()
      Prints the tree structure to standard output.
